name: Impatience
description:
"We often rush our way through game jams..."

Agreed, and this one's no different for me: announcing Impatience!
This project is the second submission to Decade Jam (and also the first "playable" one right now). Please don't take it seriously :)

I might make it more fancy in the future.

Thumbnail adapted from photo by Jan Tinneberg on Unsplash.
